title: Seduced: Rose's Story
description: Forbidden passions.Deadly secrets.A love that will stand against it all.Rose and Derek come from different worlds. Different families. Different destinies. But nothing can stop two souls meant to be together.Faced with supernatural threats beyond their control, and a power that could destroy everyone they care about, Rose and Derek hold onto their love.But is love enough when the greatest threat lives inside of you?
author: Karpov Kinrade
